input.sentences: the friends join together in one of their homes .
a girl drinks a glass of wine and relaxes .
a whole pizza has been eaten by the friends .
after they have a meal they sit for awhile at the beach .
next is the monument that is right in town .
output.sentences: I like to join my friends in their homes.
We like to relax and drink wine out of large glasses
Sometimes, I sneak old pizza out of the garbage that my friend has not eaten.
Sometime we walk down to the beach and sit for a meal.
We like to visit our town's monuments too.
